column4: Hi, I want to learn how to make & manage my own repository for my projects at work using subversion, should I install the terminal version of svn and simply work with that, or do you recommend a GUI ? (and which one ?)
If I would prefer a GUI, which one would you suggest ? (And is it better to work with terminal version first, to get the real idea of committing etc  ?)
can't really reccommend a gui, but in general i prefer command line as its much more 'direct' plus it allows you to work in other environments where a gui is not available
